Slovenska pot do uspeha: od natakarice do ene največjih zvezdnic
Nina Pušlar je povedala, da je v mlajših letih delala za točilnim pultom.
01 Nov 2019, 16:29 by A. K.



Nina Pušlar si je kot majhna deklica želela postati frizerka. FOTO: DEJAN JAVORNIK



Danes je ena najbolj priljubljenih pevk v Sloveniji. FOTO: PLANET TV


Nina Pušlar je nedvomno ena najbolj zaželenih in priljubljenih slovenskih pevk. Čeprav je že kot deklica vedela, da si želi stati na velikih odrih in ljudi navduševati s svojim angelskim glasom, je simpatična rdečelaska ena tistih žensk, ki si vseskozi širijo obzorja.


Danes je ena najbolj priljubljenih pevk v Sloveniji. FOTO: PLANET TV

Med drugim je vešča španskega jezika, obožuje vse, povezano z modo, njena pričeska pa je vedno urejena, kot bi stopila iz frizerskega salona. Nič čudnega, saj je bila njena mati po poklicu frizerka, Nina pa pravi, da bi se verjetno tudi sama odločila za to pot, če se že pred leti ne bi našla v glasbi. Nina, ki je nedavno nastopila v oddaji Pri Črnem Petru, pa ni novinka niti v gostilniškem poslu, saj se je tudi sama preizkusila pri tem delu.Bila sem deklica za vse.»Pravzaprav sem več let delala v športnem centru, ki ga je imel v najemu moj stric, tako da sem imela stik tudi z gostinstvom. To je bila res lepa izkušnja. Kot srednješolka in tudi študentka sem delala tam. Bila pa sem v bistvu deklica za vse. V sklopu objekta je bil tudi lokal, in zato sem skuhala in postregla tudi kakšno kavico,« je priznala pevka, ki pa se danes preživlja le s tem, kar ima najraje.

The Slovenian Way to Success: From a waitress to one of the biggest celebrities
Nina Pushlar said she worked behind the counter at a younger age.
01 Nov 2019, 15:29 by A.K.



Nina Puslar wanted to become a hairdresser as a little girl. PHOTO: DEJAN JAVORNIK



Today she is one of the most popular singers in Slovenia. PHOTO: PLANET TV


Nina Pushlar is undoubtedly one of the most desirable and popular Slovenian singers. Although she knew, as a girl, that she wanted to stand on the big stages and impress people with her angelic voice, the pretty redhead is one of those women who is expanding her horizons all the time.


Today she is one of the most popular singers in Slovenia. PHOTO: PLANET TV

Among other things, she is skilled in Spanish, adores everything related to fashion, and her hairstyle is always tidy as if she were leaving a hair salon. No wonder, as her mother was a hairstylist by profession, and Nina says she probably would have made the trip herself if she hadn't found herself in music years ago. Nina, who recently appeared on Pri Črni Petru, is not a newcomer to the inn business either, as she also tried out for herself in this work. I was a girl for everyone. rented my uncle so I had contact with the catering as well. It was a really nice experience. As a high school student and also a student, I worked there. But I was basically a little girl for everything. There was also a restaurant within the facility, which is why I cooked and served some coffee, ”admitted the singer, who now lives only with what she prefers.
